text.section:
An applicant for a construction license shall pay to the clerk a license fee of:
$15 for a construction license in a county other than Baltimore City, Baltimore County, or Cecil County;
$40 for a construction license in Baltimore City or Baltimore County; or
$30 for a construction license in Cecil County.

section.section: An applicant for a nonresident construction license who is incorporated or has its principal office in another state shall pay to the clerk the total fees imposed in that state on a similar nonresident business if the total fees are higher than the total license fees under this section.
